name: cretinous
content:
an offensive word to describe a person or a kind of behaviour that is considered to be very stupid or unpleasant: He made some disgusting, cretinous comments. What sort of cretinous moron are you! See
cretin
More examplesFewer examplesI have seen some cretinous behaviour recently.My cretinous boss spent the majority of his time getting friendly with the summer intern.It is difficult to avoid outpourings of cretinous ignorance online.
